price: 109. Be abejonės, Amžinybėje, jie bus pralaimėtojai.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
